properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 7:59PM EST until January 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25
kt with a few gusts up to 35 kt and seas 3 to 6 feet. For the
Freezing Spray Advisory, light accumulation of freezing spray.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME
out 25 NM and Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME out 25 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM EST Saturday.
For the Freezing Spray Advisory, until 9 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
